charge_hold: |C3|Hold |B1||C0| to charge up concentrated bursts of love.
charge_press: |C3|Press |B1||C0| to charge up concentrated bursts of love.

script_1.dialog: The dreams of this young Zaraden are very powerful.
The Zaraden is sharing her dream with This Unit.
This is the ideal situation for showing love to monsters.
This Unit will now explain how to love the monsters.
When encountering a monster, love bullets will automatically fire from your heart.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Use these love bullets to make the monsters love you.

script_2.dialog: Hey, this is easier than I thought!
|C2|This is the part where I hurt you!
The monsters will try to attack your heart.|L||!|However, they can only hurt you if they hit |C3|the core of your heart.
|C3|The core of your heart|C0| is the small circle at the center of your heart.
Are you saying that my heart     has a |shake|Heart?!
That makes about as much sense as any of this.
To ensure a safe learning environment, This Unit will set her projectile power as low as possible.

script_3.dialog: Did you see that?|L||!|My heart can handle this!
The heart of the Zaraden has other abilities as well.
Being in |C3|Focus|C0| will slow down the movement speed of your heart.
This allows for more precise movement to carefully dodge between attacks.
This Unit will now become immune to love until your heart learns how to use |C3|focus.|C0|
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Be in |C3|focus|C0| while dodging at least 6 of the following attacks.

script_4.dialog: This Unit will now explain |C3|charged attacks.|C0|
|C3|Charged shots|C0| will inflict a large amount of love, but they require |C3|energy|C0| to use efficiently.
|C3|Charged shots|C0| can still be fired without |C3|energy,|C0| but they will be significantly less powerful.
Fortunately, your heart will regenerate |C3|energy|C0| automatically, as long as you are not charging.
This Unit will now become immune to all love that is not delivered through an |C3|energized charged shot.|C0|
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| If you run out of |C3|energy,|C0| stop charging and wait for it to regenerate.

script_5.dialog: |C3|Charged shots|C0| are also very effective against breakable obstacles.
Concentrated bursts of love can easily destroy small and breakable components of a monster.
Breaking such components will also |C3|refill some energy|C0| instantly.
So, I can chain endless |wave||C3|Charged shots|C0||norm| as long as I keep breaking stuff?
To demonstrate, This Unit will now become immune to love while releasing breakable obstacles.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Break at least 6 of the following obstacles using |C3|charged attacks.|C0|

script_6.dialog: Only 40% of the initial |C3|fear|C0| remains in This Unit.
The heart of the Zaraden has one more ability to learn.
This Unit will now explain |C3|panic attacks.|C0|
I don't like the sound of that.
|C3|Panic attacks|C0| will nullify any attack that they touch.
|C3|Panic attacks|C0| can also be used to inflict massive love upon a monster.
Those sound a lot better than the panic attacks that I was thinking of.
However, |C3|panic attacks|C0| are very limited and will not regenerate on their own.
The amount of remaining panics is displayed at the top, below your health bar.
To ensure a stress-free learning environment, This Unit will return any |C3|panic attacks|C0| that are used during this part of the battle.
|C2|Don't worry!|!||L|I'll make sure that your panic is infinite for this part!
This Unit will now become immune to love until your heart learns how to use |C3|panic attacks.|C0|
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Use a |C3|panic attack|C0| to nullify all of these bullets.

script_7.dialog: This Unit will now begin your final lesson.
There are certain monsters that can use |C3|full arena attacks.|C0|
This Unit is now electrifying all of the air in this arena.
|C2|There is no escape from this pain!
Contrary to that previous statement, there is indeed an escape from this pain.
As long as your heart remains within a |C3|yellow safety bubble,|C0| it will not be affected by a |C3|full arena attack.|C0|
It is also possible to leave a |C3|safety bubble|C0| and still remain unharmed for a short time.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Only leave |C3|safety bubbles|C0| when it is absolutely necessary. When doing so, quickly enter a new one.

script_8.dialog: The young Zaraden has shown love to This Unit.
There is no trace of |C3|fear|C0| remaining within This Unit.
The young Zaraden has learned to use all of her lovely abilities.
The Zaraden will be returning from this dream state momentarily.
|wave|Thank you, Little Robot.|norm||!| I didn't realize love could be so powerful.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Use these abilities to make the monsters love you.
That sounds a little strange,    but I think I get what you mean.
Now I have something to tell YOU.
This Unit is experiencing a sudden rise in temperature.
This Unit predicts a high probability of success with the monsters.
